name: LitMan Durability
description:
[quote]Latest Update. Dev Kit Version 300976.29848.[/quote]

[b]Durability of Tools, Weapons and Shields Increased Ten Times.[/b]

You can increase or decrease durability even without this Mod.

To set durability x2 times for your tools, weapons and armor add those two entries bellow to your "ServerSetting.ini" file.

DurabilityMultiplier=0.500000
ShieldDurabilityMultiplier=0.500000

Solo file location
<DRIVE>:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Conan Exiles\ConanSandbox\Saved\Config\WindowsNoEditor\ServerSettings.ini

Server file location
<DRIVE>:\<SERVER FOLDER>\ConanSandbox\Saved\Config\WindowsServer\ServerSettings.ini

Hits with Stone Pick:
DurabilityMultiplier=1.000000 = x1 = 80 hits as Vanilla Game
DurabilityMultiplier=0.500000 = x2 = 160 hits 
DurabilityMultiplier=0.100000 = x10 = 800 hits as this Mod
DurabilityMultiplier=0.010000 = x100 = 8000 hits

If you gonna use DurabilityMultiplier settings in file and this Mod it will be overwrited.

Support Channel on Discord: https://discord.gg/kQS7t74

I released all my Source files on Gitlab https://gitlab.com/kasperaitis/conan-exiles-mods if anyone wants to keep updated those Mods or release own ones.

If you need a previous version it also could be found on Gitlab https://gitlab.com/kasperaitis/conan-exiles-mods/tree/master/Compiled

Mod ID: 887629852
changeNote:
Dev Kit Version 300976.29848

Updated to match the live game version.
author: LitMan
